about_the_game:
Best Real-Time AI Voice Changer

Instant Voice Transformation: Change your voice into female, male, characters or in any simulated environment on-the-fly.

Extensive Soundboard: Enhance your communication with 300+ voice effects and voice memes, perfect for adding fun and variety to your interactions on platforms like Discord, Zoom, and Twitch.

Customize Unique Voice: Use our Voice Studio to create your exclusive voices and impress your teammates, friends and family.

Voice Recording: Record your voice, offering endless possibilities for content creation.

Noise Reduction: Provide an excellent environment for you to change your voice with no background noise and no interference.
detailed_description:
Best Real-Time AI Voice Changer

Instant Voice Transformation: Change your voice into female, male, characters or in any simulated environment on-the-fly.

Extensive Soundboard: Enhance your communication with 300+ voice effects and voice memes, perfect for adding fun and variety to your interactions on platforms like Discord, Zoom, and Twitch.

Customize Unique Voice: Use our Voice Studio to create your exclusive voices and impress your teammates, friends and family.

Voice Recording: Record your voice, offering endless possibilities for content creation.

Noise Reduction: Provide an excellent environment for you to change your voice with no background noise and no interference.
name: MagicMic - Real-time Voice Changer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Processor
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) UHD Graphics 630
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4096 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit sound Card, compatible with DirectX 8.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10、Win11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Processor i7
  • Memory: 6144 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8192 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit sound Card, compatible with DirectX 8.0

short_description: MagicMic change your voice with 100+ various AI voice filters in real-time, allowing you to create an ultra-realistic and engaging audio experience for any scenario. Whether you're gaming, live streaming, or on a voice call, our software makes everyone believe this is your own voice.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Japanese, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Arabic, Korean, Russian, Thai
